entry.string: Userpoints is a Xaraya Utility Module.
entry.translation: Userpueents is a Xereya Uteelity Mudoole-a.

entry.string: It is currently responsible for accomplishing these tasks:
entry.translation: It is coorrently respunseeble-a fur eccumpleeshing zeese-a tesks:

entry.string: The userpoints module is a utility module that allows you to add a score for level of participation of your users. Users earn points based on what type of content they submit.
entry.translation: Zee userpueents mudoole-a is a uteelity mudoole-a thet elloos yuoo tu edd a scure-a fur lefel ooff perteecipeshun ooff yuoor users. Users iern pueents besed oon vhet type-a ooff cuntent zeey soobmeet. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: From the Modules Administration configure the userpoints hook with any content module that you would like to count score for.
entry.translation: Frum zee Mudooles Edmeenistreshun cunffeegoore-a zee userpueents huuk veet uny cuntent mudoole-a thet yuoo vuoold leeke-a tu cuoont scure-a fur. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: There are no included blocks at this time.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: The userpoints hook is a display hook to allow content modules to score points.
entry.translation: Zee userpueents huuk is a deespley huuk tu elloo cuntent mudooles tu scure-a pueents. Um gesh dee bork, bork!
